name: releupth

comment: The set ` ( EulerPaths `` G ) ` of all Eulerian paths on ` G ` is a set of pairs by our definition of an Eulerian path, and so is a relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Feb-2021.)
